document.discussion_title: Baja farmworkers win raises, benefits in landmark deal
document.topic_text: It started as a door-knocking campaign by poor indigenous villagers, then grew into a well-organized movement that mobilized thousands and brought powerful agribusinesses and the federal government to the negotiating table. The tense
